page.title: 07HOOK NORTON LEISURE GROUPS
page.content: {The Tennis Club} meets at the tennis courts adjacent to the Sports and Social Club.Tennis coaching available. {The Toddlers Club} meet at the Playgroup Centre.Members,aged 0-3 play together, while mothers meet to talk. {The Village India Group} exists to link the villages of Hook Norton and Great Rollright with Pindval in India. {The Welcome Club} meets at the Baptist Hall.Membership open to senior citizens -the group exists to meet friends and share interests. {The Womens' Institute} meets at Hook Norton Primary School.The group meets to discuss topical events and share household crafts. {The Youth Club} meets at the Youth Centre. Members, aged 13-21. The group aims to encourage hobbies and sports.
